        public EvictionPolicyComparator getEvictionPolicyComparator()

      • evaluate

        public <C extends EvictionCandidate<A,E>> C evaluate(Iterable<C> evictionCandidates)
        Selects the best candidate to be evicted. The definition of the best depends on configured eviction policy. (LRU, LFU, custom, etc) It returns null when there the input is empty.
        Parameters:
        evictionCandidates - Multiple EvictionCandidate to be evicted
        Returns:
        a selected candidate to be evicted or null.
